import React from "react"; import NavBar from "@components/navBar" import { observer, inject } from "mobx-react" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import "./style.scss" type UserInfoProps = { userState: UserState } const UserInfo = (props: UserInfoProps) => { const { push } = useHistory(); const { userState, homeState } = props as propsData; const { logout } = userState as UserState; const { data } = homeState; const logoutHandl = () => { logout(); push("/login") } return (

{data.realName} {data.loginName}

  • push("banks")}>

    收款银行卡

  • push("bills")}>

    账单

  • push("activation")}>

    激活口令

  • push("password")}>

    修改密码

logoutHandl()}>退出登陆

) } export default inject('userState', 'homeState')((observer(UserInfo)));
